name: Alpine Meadow
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Alpine Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Here perished Rognar the Reckless after his hundred-day battle with the Ironmaw Dragon. We raised these stones to mark his resting place."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Annul
oracle_text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
flavor_text:
"Many giants have tried to crush me with their hammers. You'll never stop me with that little toy."
—Stigur of the Omenseekers

name: Arachnoform
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has reach, and is every creature type.
flavor_text: Deep within the endless webs of cloning silk, the weaver awaits.

name: Arctic Treeline
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Arctic Treeline enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"When the Light of Starnheim shines here, every frost-edged needle glitters with the reflected glory of the Cosmos."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Augury Raven
oracle_text:
Flying
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: Some ravens collect shiny baubles; others hoard omens and secrets.

name: Axgard Braggart
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{W}: Untap Axgard Braggart. Put a +1/+1 counter on it. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "Heavy? Ha! The Trollking of Mossrun was heavy, and I tossed him five miles!"

name: Axgard Cavalry
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Riding the goat
—Dwarven expression meaning
"a foolhardy act of bravery"

name: Battlefield Raptor
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text: It wheeled upward, away from the shrieks and thunder. It reached the point where sky met smoke, and, but with a glance at the horizon, aimed itself and dove.

name: Behold the Multiverse
oracle_text:
Scry 2, then draw two cards.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: Countless worlds unfolded before Niko, every one in need of heroes.

name: Berg Strider
oracle_text: When Berg Strider enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. If {S} was spent to cast this spell, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

name: Beskir Shieldmate
oracle_text: When Beskir Shieldmate dies, create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: "If we fall today, let us fall with honor, defending our realm from the horrors that would defile it. Forward, shieldmates! To Starnheim!"

name: Bind the Monster
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Bind the Monster enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. It deals damage to you equal to its power.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Sarulf's snarl of rage shook the World Tree.

name: Bound in Gold
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
flavor_text:
"Trespassers will be smelted."
—Axgard inscription

name: Breakneck Berserker
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: "Go for the knees! The last giant who tried to get past us got rolled back down the mountain in a dozen pieces."

name: Brinebarrow Intruder
oracle_text:
Flash
When Brinebarrow Intruder enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Locked in the ice of Karfell, the treasures of ancient nobles await in ruins guarded by the dead.

name: Broken Wings
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Fynn climbed the highest peak and waited, still and silent, until the falling snow had hidden him entirely. When the great eagle flew past, the hunter's aim was true."
—*Saga of the Wisdom Seeker*

name: Cinderheart Giant
oracle_text:
Trample
When Cinderheart Giant dies, it deals 7 damage to a creature an opponent controls chosen at random.
flavor_text: What fire giants lack in arcane prowess, they make up for with reckless, explosive rage.

name: Codespell Cleric
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Codespell Cleric enters the battlefield, if it was the second spell you cast this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Today we are not Beskir or Tuskeri. We must fight as one clan, shoulder to shoulder, to defend our rightful home!"

name: Craven Hulk
oracle_text: Craven Hulk can't block alone.
flavor_text: Abandoned at birth, the giant was raised by goats. Ironically, it grew up to be the most cautious member of the herd.

name: Deathknell Berserker
oracle_text: When Deathknell Berserker dies, if its power was 3 or greater, create a 2/2 black Zombie Berserker creature token.
flavor_text:
"Sven felled the elf with an arrow through the chest, but moments later, the corpse rose with a sneer to fight again."
—*Longbeard Saga*

name: Demon Bolt
oracle_text:
Demon Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text:
"Burn them from the sky."
—Varragoth

name: Demonic Gifts
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."
flavor_text: It began as a flavor on the tongue, like a bloody morsel of roast boar—but soon the power was a conflagration in her veins.

name: Depart the Realm
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: "My home calls to me, I must go."

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"The skald boasted that he could outsing the sea. Cosima heard him, and drowned his village with a single wave."
—*Longbeard Saga*

name: Dogged Pursuit
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Kaya had stalked countless horrific foes, but never one that killed with such callous precision and twisted creativity.

name: Doomskar Oracle
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you gain 2 life.
Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: "Giants and monsters loom on the horizon, and the elves plan to murder our gods!"

name: Draugr Recruiter
oracle_text: Boast — {3}{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "You cannot stand against us, but when you fall, you will stand with us!"

name: Draugr Thought-Thief
oracle_text: When Draugr Thought-Thief enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.
flavor_text: The worst part is that you won't even remember how much he's taken from you.

name: Dread Rider
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses 3 life.
flavor_text:
"What kind of monstrous grave robber leaves the treasures, but takes the bodies?"
—Fjall, Beskir elder

name: Duskwielder
oracle_text: Boast — {1}: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "My shadow alone will slay you."

name: Dwarven Reinforcements
oracle_text:
Create two 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature tokens.
Foretell {1}{R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: "Orders? We don't wait for orders!"

name: Elderfang Disciple
oracle_text: When Elderfang Disciple enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: "One day, the great serpent will rejoin us on Skemfar, and those who've wronged us will taste of our venom."

name: Elderleaf Mentor
oracle_text: When Elderleaf Mentor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: "Our ancestors grew complacent in their divinity, allowing their lessers to topple them. Never again."

name: Fearless Pup
oracle_text:
First strike
Boast — {2}{R}: Fearless Pup gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "Awooo!"

name: Feed the Serpent
oracle_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: He spent the final moments of his existence tumbling down the length of the serpent's jaws, driven mad by the magnitude of the Cosmos.

name: Frost Bite
oracle_text: Frost Bite deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you control three or more snow permanents, it deals 3 damage instead.
flavor_text:
"Don't wander far—it's a bit nippy out there!"
—Leidurr, expedition leader

name: Frostpeak Yeti
oracle_text: {1}{S}: Frostpeak Yeti can't be blocked this turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: Some heroes line their coats with yeti fur. More yetis line their bellies with heroes.

name: Funeral Longboat
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Cast onto the windless water, he drifted until the sea turned to sky."
—*Saga of the Lost King*

name: Giant Ox
oracle_text: Giant Ox crews Vehicles using its toughness rather than its power.
flavor_text:
"How strong is he? Well, I once lost control of the plow, and he carved a furrow right through my house! Didn't even slow down."
—Guldir, Beskir farmer

name: Glacial Floodplain
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Glacial Floodplain enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"A cliff once rose from the surf here—until Bjora Dawn-Greeter declared that it was blocking her view and pulled it down bare-handed."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

Enchant land
Enchanted land is snow.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

name: Gnottvold Recluse
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Fed up with webs impeding travelers in other realms, Kolvori banished the giant spiders to Gnottvold, where their webs snare only the occasional rampaging troll.

name: Gods' Hall Guardian

Vigilance
Foretell {3}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: Not a single rat has been seen in Istfell since the gods moved in.

name: Goldmaw Champion
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{W}: Tap target creature. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "That was nothing. I once took down a frost giant with a spoon!"

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

name: Grizzled Outrider
flavor_text: "Sure, a horse might be faster. But I'd like to see a horse take the head clean off a troll in one swipe!"

oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
When Guardian Gladewalker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Highland Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:

({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
